description: This file defines an AppStateProvider class for managing application state related to user subscription premium status and UI tab selection, with persistence via local storage.

classes.name: AppStateProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages application state such as premium status and selected tab, with persistent storage integration.

methods.name: AppStateProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider and loads persisted state.

methods.name: isPremium
methods.description: Getter indicating whether the user has a premium subscription.

methods.name: selectedTab
methods.description: Getter for the currently selected UI tab index.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Private method to load state from local storage.

methods.name: setPremium
methods.description: Method to update the premium status and persist it.

methods.name: selectTab
methods.description: Method to update the selected tab index and persist it.
